page.title: 10Salhouse Primary School 2
page.content:
School Activities {***************** The school enters football and netball competitions.They have a Sports Day and they play rounders. The school has won trophies for : netball (1981) ; 5-a-side football (1973) and football (1981). The school has a microcomputer which is used in lessons and there is an adventure playground in the school grounds.The children have been on visits to{Sandringham, Cromer}and{ {Sheringham. } Although there is no school orchestra, there is a small music club. When they leave the school, the pupils transfer to{Broadland High School. }
report by Daniel Wright and Paul Smith
